function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate home quarantine measures","Impact":"Increased risk of spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement stricter and more effective home quarantine measures","Technologies":"Geolocation tracking, monitoring apps","People":"Residents of Wuhan","Owner":"Local government and health authorities"},{"Description":"Shortage of medical beds","Impact":"Limited capacity to isolate and treat infected individuals","Mitigation":"Increase the number of medical beds and hospital facilities","Technologies":"Rapid hospital construction, modular hospital units","People":"Patients and medical staff in Wuhan","Owner":"Health authorities and construction companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate supply of face masks","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of self-protection measures, leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Ensure an adequate supply of face masks for medical staff and citizens","Technologies":"Mass production of face masks, distribution planning","People":"Medical staff and citizens in Wuhan","Owner":"Health authorities and manufacturers"}]}
